content: “Every patient’s voice matters,” she says, underscoring her commitment to ensuring that each patient feels heard and supported. She believes that by amplifying patient concerns and sharing them with the medical team, DCC can continually improve the quality of care and build stronger, trust-based relationships. Kimberly serves as a key resource for both patients and staff, fostering a culture of professionalism and patient-centered care.DCC Culture Care Liaisons understand that trust is the cornerstone of the patient-provider relationship. By actively engaging with patients, addressing their grievances, and collaborating with staff, they create a seamless and empowering patient experience. Spearheading initiatives such as lobby days and consistently promoting patient-centered care, these dedicated individuals contribute to the continuous improvement of DCC’s services and overall patient satisfaction. To sum up, patient liaisons play a vital role in fostering DCC’s culture of excellence. Professionals like Tami, Alfonso, and Kimberly bridge the wide gap between patients and the healthcare system through their unwavering empathy, active listening, and commitment to addressing patient concerns. Their tireless dedication to professionalism and patient satisfaction reinforces DCC’s commitment to delivering exceptional care and always leading with care.
title: Culture Liaisons - Dialysis Care Center
